text:
Juan Carlos Dante Gullo (8 June 1947 − 3 May 2019) was an Argentine sociologist and politician. He served as a member of the Chamber of Deputies from 2007 to 2011. He was also a member the Buenos Aires City Legislature from 2011 to 2015. He was born in Buenos Aires.
Gullo died on 3 May 2019, at the age of 71.
